key.name: nbrecents
key.description: Sets the number of recently used emojis to display.

key.name: nbcols
key.description: Sets the number of column of emojis to display in subcategories.

key.name: emojisize
key.description: Default size of emojis (px) ; doesn't concern recently used items

key.name: classic-interface
key.summary: if submenus or buttons should be used
key.description: If false, buttons will be used. If true, the classic interface with submenus will be used.

key.name: search-enabled
key.description: If false, the search entry will not be displayed.
